usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary:

This library is used to read and write PLY (Polygon File Format) files, allowing developers to import and export 3D models in this widely-used format. With plyfile, developers can easily load and manipulate PLY files in their Python applications for tasks such as data visualization, computer-aided design, or game development.
